attributes.action: Give parents the right to keep there children home from school during the covid
attributes.additional_details:
Its totally unfair that we do not have the choice to keep our children home during the pandemic 
Our children are suffering mentally with the fear of bringing covid home to there family who some are classed as high risk
attributes.background: I want to be given the opportunity to keep our children at home without the fear of being fined or losing there school place

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740
